nars.core

Class DefaultNARBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.core.Parameters
      • nars.core.NARBuilder
        • nars.core.DefaultNARBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConceptBuilder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandLineNARBuilder, ContinuousBagNARBuilder

    public class DefaultNARBuilder
extends NARBuilder
    Default set of NAR parameters which have been classically used for development.
